page.title: 13A SENIOR CITIZEN OF 1985
page.content: Nutshalling Close, bungalows for Senior Citizens on the Calmore Estate, is a very pleasant place to live according to Mrs McAdam a resident for 3\ years.{ Her great joy is living {next to the schools,watching and {listening to the pupils enjoying {themselves at work and play.}She misses the children at holiday times.The fresh country air of the estate is also enjoyed,although when the weather is bad she does not like having to wait for a bus to take her to the shops.{Friends and relatives {from outside the area often had {difficulty in finding her, since the {estate is not very well sign posted. They like being away from the noise of the traffic and although they are sometimes disturbed by noise from the pub they live together as good neighbours enjoying the pleasant area.
